A classic example: `clusterid` and `communication revision` , used to distinguish different APISIX clusters for supper system. discuss in mail list: https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/r9240829c3293d9cf859d451935e75afd837bd35d169c4038dcb7f9ac%40%3Cdev.apisix.apache.org%3E
